name: Propellum
tag_list: job-wrapping, wrapping, scraping, website-integration, job-scraping, spidering, crawling, jobwrap, jobwrapping, screen-scraping, wrap, scrape
overview:
Propellum (a divison of Zycus ) is a company that provides job wrapping services to job boards in the United States and Canada.

Propellum also aggregates data from other domains such as real estate , auto, pets and online shopping catalogues .

Propellum uses AI based auto job-classification software, enabling jobs to be classified automatically and accurately in over 500 categories. This classification code “meta-data” in turn enables powerful search.

Not just from job boards

Propellum is powered by one of the worlds most advanced spidering technology that fetches job content from source (enterprise portals). The setup is done instantly, and we guarantee near 100% coverage.

Not just lower total cost

Propellum guarantees the worlds fastest turn-around time in aggregating job content from source to classification and enrichment, ending with rapid verticalized syndication all at an extremely compitative total cost.
